Breadcrumbs   Graduate College    Funding & Awards    Graduate College Fellowship and Award Deadlines        Graduate College Fellowship and Award Deadlines       Graduate College Fellowship and Award Deadlines   Access Fellowship   Round I – Recruitment only  Department nominations due to the Graduate College: February 3, 2020  Announcement of awards: February 26, 2020  Last day for awardees to inform Graduate College of acceptance: April 15, 2020  Round II – Retention  Department nominations due to the Graduate College: April 1, 2020  Announcement of awards: April 24, 2020  Annual Graduate College Outstanding Thesis and Dissertation Award    Program/Department nominations due to the Graduate College: October 25, 2019  Announcement of awards: December 2, 2019  Award for Graduate Research  Fall 2019  Applications/Department nominations due to the Graduate College: October 18, 2019  Announcement of awards: December 2, 2019  Spring 2020  Applications/Department nominations due to the Graduate College: March 20, 2020  Announcement of awards: April 20, 2020  Dean’s Scholar Fellowship    Department nominations due to the Graduate College: March 13, 2020  Announcement of awards: April 20, 2020  Last day for awardees to inform Graduate College of acceptance: June 1, 2020  Graduate Mentoring Award  Graduate Mentoring Awards are designed to encourage and award excellence and innovation in all aspects of graduate mentoring. Each year the Graduate College will provide up to four awards of $2,000 each per year.   The 2020 deadline has been extended from March 1 to March 6 (4PM).  Winners will be announced around April 20, 2020   Provost’s Graduate Internship Award   Student submits completed application and related documents to their degree program. Contact your degree program for their deadline and instructions (program will need sufficient time to review and process before their submission date listed below)  Director of Graduate Studies uploads application and related documents via the Graduate College website: March 20, 2020 EXTENDED TO APRIL 1, 2020  Announcement of Awards: April 20, 2020  Provost’s Graduate Research Award   Student submits completed application and related documents to their degree program. Contact your degree program for their deadline and instructions (program will need sufficient time to review and process before their submission date listed below)  Director of Graduate Studies uploads application and related documents via the Graduate College website (under For Faculty/Staff, access restricted): October 14 2019  Announcement of Awards: December 2, 2019.  SROP Early Admissions Fellowship  The candidate formally applies to UIC and their SROP mentor submits a nomination to the graduate program Director of Graduate Studies (DGS) by December 15, 2019.  UIC Pipeline to an Inclusive Faculty (PIF) Program  Nominees for the Access (Recruitment) Fellowship and University Fellowships are automatically considered for the PIF.  University Fellowship   Department nominations due to the Graduate College: February 3, 2020  Announcement of awards: February 26, 2020  Last day for awardees to inform Graduate College of acceptance: April 15, 2020           Funding & Awards           Graduate Funding Overview     April 15th Resolution    Assistantships      Fellowships & Awards     Fellowship Office Information    Graduate College Tuition & Fee Waivers    UIC Pipeline to an Inclusive Faculty (PIF) Program    Graduate College Professional Success Program (PSP) for Fellows    Emergency Grants      Other Funding     Online Funding Resources    National & International Opportunities
